activities:
Activities of SirsiDynix with respect to personal information received from the European Union:
- Customers 
The collected information is used for: 
o	Measuring traffic flow and volume. 
o	Diagnosing and providing solutions to server problems. 
o	Providing customer services and training
- Employees
o	Human Resource information may be used in the context of the employment relationship.	
o	Where used in the employment relationship, SirsiDynix is committed to cooperate with the EU authorities concerned in conformity with Safe Harbor FAQ 9 and FAQ 5 as applicable and will comply with the advice given by such authorities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and human resource data; customer data; data of our customers' customers.
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner. For other data: TRUSTe Dispute Resolution Program
